meanings.definition: A set of electronic components in a computer that manages the data flow between the processor, memory, and peripherals.
meanings.sent1: The chipset helps the computer send information between the brain, memory, and other parts.
meanings.sent2: My new computer's chipset ensures smooth communication between the processor and memory.
meanings.sent3: When the chipset went on strike, the computer couldn't remember anything!
meanings.sent4: The chipset is like a traffic controller directing data to different parts of the computer.
meanings.sent5: I imagine the chipset as a conductor orchestrating the flow of information within the computer.

meanings.definition: The group of chips in a computer that controls its various functions.
meanings.sent1: Every computer needs a reliable chipset to manage its operations effectively.
meanings.sent2: The chipset in my laptop ensures all components work together seamlessly.
meanings.sent3: The chipset threw a party and invited all the other computer parts to celebrate!
meanings.sent4: In a computer, the chipset acts like a captain steering the ship through different tasks.
meanings.sent5: The chipset is the brain of the computer, coordinating all its activities efficiently.
